title: Memory Retrieve Input
description: Retrieve relevant memories and context from MemoryOS based on a query. Searches across short-term conversations, mid-term contextual sessions, and long-term user knowledge to provide comprehensive historical context for informed responses.

explanation.description: One sentence explanation of why this memory retrieval is being performed

query.description: The search query to find relevant memories and context

relationship_with_user.description: The relationship context between agent and user for response personalization

style_hint.description: Optional style hint for how retrieved memories should be contextualized

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return from each memory type
